message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value it holds for me, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still not able to go beyond $9,500 for this product. I hope we can find a solution that respects my budget while still allowing me to acquire the item.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $10,200. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal. I hope you can meet me in the middle.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,800 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $10,100. This is my final offer, and I hope you can see the value in the product and meet me at this price.

Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal carefully, and I would like to counter with an offer of $9,900 for the product. I hope this is a price that you can accept, given the value of the product to me.

I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. I've already made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll offer it to you for $10,050. This is my absolute final offer.

I'm sorry to hear that this might be your final offer, Alice. I've reached the limit of my budget, and I'm unable to increase my offer further. I appreciate your efforts and the value of the product, but I must adhere to my financial constraints. I would like to propose a final offer of $9,950 for the product. I hope this is a price that you can consider accepting.
